events.text: Fuck, I feel even worse than before, but it’s almost over. And then I can take care of [Daughter] and we’ll almost be a normal family again… [Wife]… I’m so sorry…
It’s gotten only more treacherous out there. I should definitely bring my gun cause god knows how many of those mangled mutants there are now out there.
Where could she be? There’s no school today after all. Maybe she’s still at her friend’s?
